    public static interface ControllerDevice.Listener
extends PoseListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnectionEvent(ControllerDevice controllerDevice, int index, boolean isConnected)
      onConnectionEvent is an event, raised when a controllerDevice is disconnected from the tracking device.
      void onControllerEvent(ControllerEvent controllerEvent)
      onControllerEvent is a generalized controller event customized by the controller vendor.

    • Method Detail

      • onControllerEvent

        void onControllerEvent(ControllerEvent controllerEvent)
        onControllerEvent is a generalized controller event customized by the controller vendor.
        Parameters:
        controllerEvent - generalized controller data.

      • onConnectionEvent

        void onConnectionEvent(ControllerDevice controllerDevice,
                       int index,
                       boolean isConnected)
        onConnectionEvent is an event, raised when a controllerDevice is disconnected from the tracking device.
        Parameters:
        controllerDevice - an instance of the relevant controllerDevice.
        index - the index of the relevant controllerDevice.
        isConnected - the connection state of the controller device.
